titles.title: A bill to extend the suspension of duty on mixtures of difenoconazole and mefenoxam.
A bill to extend the suspension of duty on mixtures of difenoconazole and mefenoxam.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension of duty on mixtures of difenoconazole and mefenoxam.
